title: Manifesto
creator_credit: Julian Rosefeldt, Schiwago Film and Bayerischer Rundfunk
brief_description: Julian Rosefeldt’s outstanding tribute to various art manifestos of the 19th and 20th century, ranging from Communism to Dogme, in connection with 13 different characters played by Cate Blanchett. A striking humorous audio-visual experience.

constellations_other.name: Clones, doubles and doppelgangers
constellations_other.description: Multiple characters and doubles materialise in this Constellation inspired by the pioneering special effects of Georges Méliès.

creator_credit_for_label: Julian Rosefeldt, Schiwago Film and Bayerischer Rundfunk
description: An outstanding tribute to various (art) manifestos of the nineteenth and twentieth century, ranging from Communism to Dogme, in connection with thirteen different characters, including a homeless man, a factory worker and a corporate CEO, who are all played by Cate Blanchett. A striking humorous audio-visual experience.
description_for_label: An outstanding tribute to various (art) manifestos of the nineteenth and twentieth century, ranging from Communism to Dogme, in connection with thirteen different characters, including a homeless man, a factory worker and a corporate CEO, who are all played by Cate Blanchett. A striking humorous audio-visual experience.
